item.title: Breweries or Wineries ??
item.author: senthil.thyagarajan@gmail.com (Senthil Thyagarajan)
item.description: .myIframe { position: relative; padding-bottom: 65.25%; padding-top: 30px; height: 0; overflow: auto; -webkit-overflow-scrolling:touch; //When you think about Texas, the first thing that would come in mind is barbecue which of course pairs well with a good beer. In this post I have mapped each state in the US ranked based on the breweries or wineries present. I got the data from the Brewers Association and the American Winery Guide. With data visualization being so important in representing the dataset I have used hexbins shapefile from Don Meltz's repo.
